If you want to feel like in another era and eat great simple food this is the place for you. My wife said it felt like  being in Cuba... English will not get you anywhere but probably castillano would be even worse here! So just pick something from the board , on the right column under "PEIX" it's all fish and it's all good! Have the "bomba" as accompaniment, it is great.
Sant Pere, Santa Caterina i la Ribera-Born, Barcelona, Spain
